metadata.title: CVE-2020-35477 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.35.1 blocks legitimate attempts to hide log entries insome situations. If one sets MediaWiki:Mainpage to Special:MyLanguage/MainPage, visits a log entry on Special:Log, and toggles the "Change visibilityof selected log entries" checkbox (or a tags checkbox) next to it, there isa redirection to the main page's action=historysubmit (instead of thedesired behavior in which a revision-deletion form appears).

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
